```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Show 

- Code that loads data (always) 
- Code that estimates models (always)
- A Dump of Data (never)

# Hide 

- Cleaning code (unless that is the review that you're looking for)
- Issues and notes to yourself 

# Comment 

- Documentation for functions, in the function
- Any knowledge that someone *running* the code might need.
